item.title: 尽管美国呼吁再平衡，习近平仍在权衡新的中国制造计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，习近平主席的政府正在考虑制定新版总体规划，以促进高端技术产品的生产，这表明在唐纳德-特朗普总统希望将更多工厂迁回美国之际，政府有意继续牢牢控制制造业。【原文：President Xi Jinping’s government is considering a new version of its master plan to boost production of high-end technological goods, according to people familiar with the matter, signaling its intention to keep a firm grip on manufacturing as President Donald Trump looks to bring more factories back to the US.】

item.title: 日本出售大米库存，旨在将飙升的价格减半
item.description: 在日本即将举行夏季大选之际，新任命的农业大臣小泉晋二郎表示，日本将以固定价格出售更多的大米库存，以期将飙升的成本减半。【原文：Japan will sell additional stockpiles of rice at a fixed price with an aim to halve soaring costs, newly-appointed agriculture minister Shinjiro Koizumi said as the country heads toward a summer election.】

item.title: 通胀飙升，加沙战争升级，以色列将暂缓加息
item.description: 在加沙军事行动增加和通货膨胀率上升的情况下，以色列中央银行将连续第 11 次按兵不动。【原文：Israel’s central bank is set to keep interest rates on hold for the 11th time in a row, amid increased military operations in Gaza and an uptick in inflation.】

item.title: 利率攀升，明治安田的纸质债券损失猛增八倍
item.description: 明治安田生命保险株式会社（Meiji Yasuda Life Insurance Co.【原文：Meiji Yasuda Life Insurance Co. said unrealized losses on its domestic bond holdings increased more than eightfold last fiscal year, in the latest sign of how climbing interest rates are weighing on the portfolios of Japanese insurers.】

item.title: 欧盟关税延迟提振对风险敏感的外汇市场，美元延续跌势
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）决定推迟对欧盟征收更高的关税，这提振了与全球贸易关系密切的其他货币，从而使美元汇率跌至近两年来的最低水平。【原文：A gauge of the dollar slid toward its lowest level in nearly two years after US President Donald Trump’s decision to postpone higher tariffs on the European Union boosted other currencies with strong links to global trade.】

item.title: 特朗普延长欧盟关税期限，新兴货币走强
item.description: 由于华盛顿决定延长对欧盟征收激进关税的最后期限，刺激了风险偏好，新兴市场货币指数升至历史新高。【原文：A gauge of emerging-market currencies rallied to a record high as Washington’s decision to extend the deadline for aggressive tariffs on the European Union bolstered risk appetite.】

item.title: 卡什卡利称 "不确定 "9 月前利率走势
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）表示，随着特朗普政府继续与多国政府进行关税谈判，美国贸易和移民政策的重大转变为美联储官员在9月之前采取利率行动带来了不确定性。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari said major shifts in US trade and immigration policy are creating uncertainty for Fed officials to move on interest rates before September, as the Trump administration continues tariff talks with numerous governments.】

item.title: 降价幅度加大，比亚迪领跌中国电动汽车股
item.description: 比亚迪股份有限公司周一在香港领跌中国电动汽车股，投资者正在消化这家汽车巨头上周末大幅降价多达 35% 的消息。【原文：BYD Co. led Chinese electric vehicle stocks lower in Hong Kong on Monday, as investors digested the auto giant’s sweeping price cuts of as much as 35% late last week.】

item.title: 高盛预计人民币走强将提振中国股市
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Chinese stocks are expected to benefit from further gains in the yuan, which has been showing resilience amid the country’s trade spat with the US, according to strategists at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: OpenAI 将在韩国开店以促进进一步发展
item.description: OpenAI 已在韩国成立了一个法律实体，力求进一步推动其人工智能技术的应用。【原文：OpenAI has established a legal entity in South Korea, seeking to propel further adoption of its artificial intelligence technologies.】

item.title: 印度股市或将受益于美元疲软和欧盟关税推迟
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 日本主权债券削减近期令投资者震惊的跌幅
item.description: 日本超长期债券收益率正从纪录高位回落，但投资者在周三的 40 年期债券拍卖前仍保持谨慎。【原文：Japan’s super-long yields are pulling back from record highs, but investors remain cautious before a 40-year bond auction on Wednesday.】

item.title: 高盛称中国钢铁出口将因壁垒增加而下降
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The blowout in Chinese steel exports has likely peaked, as trade barriers mount and domestic production falls, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 关税谈判是关键，日本吹捧船舶技术和液化天然气投资
item.description: 日本可能会提供从阿拉斯加液化天然气管道项目投资到造船专业技术等方面的资金和技术援助，以争取在 6 月中旬之前与美国达成关税协议。【原文：Japan may offer financial and technical contributions ranging from investment in an Alaskan LNG pipeline project to shipbuilding expertise as it seeks to smooth the path toward a tariff deal with the US by mid-June.】

item.title: 马来西亚安瓦尔写信给特朗普寻求与东南亚国家举行峰会
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）表示，他亲自致函唐纳德-特朗普，寻求组织一次与东南亚国家的会议，因为他对美国总统提议提高关税感到担忧。【原文：Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim said he personally wrote to Donald Trump seeking to organize a meeting with Southeast Asian nations amid concerns over the US president’s proposed tariff hikes.】

item.title: GMO 集团放弃出售其互联网部门 20 亿美元股份的计划
item.description: 日本企业集团 GMO 互联网集团公司以目前的市场状况为由，取消了旗下一家上市子公司的股票发行计划。【原文：The Japanese conglomerate GMO Internet Group Inc. canceled a planned share offering of one of its listed arms, citing current market conditions as reason.】

item.title: 受美元和石油影响，菲律宾比索升至 2023 年以来最强
item.description: 受美元和油价疲软的提振，菲律宾比索兑美元汇率升至近两年来的最强水平。【原文：The Philippine peso rose to its strongest level in almost two years against the dollar, buoyed by weakness in the dollar and oil prices.】

item.title: 特朗普延长关税期限，欧洲股市期货上涨
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在与欧盟委员会主席乌尔苏拉-冯德莱恩通电话后表示，他将把欧盟面临50%关税的最后期限延长至7月9日，此后欧洲股指期货上涨。【原文：European stock index futures gained after President Donald Trump said he would extend the deadline for the European Union to face 50% tariffs until July 9 after a phone call with Commission President Ursula von der Leyen.】

item.title: 韩元或因政治风险缓解和贸易协议押注而延续涨势
item.description: 越来越多的分析师看涨韩元，他们预计该国与美国的贸易谈判以及政治不确定性的缓解将延续近期的涨势。【原文：The South Korean won is attracting a growing number of bullish calls from analysts, who expect the country’s trade negotiations with the US and easing political uncertainties to extend a recent rally.】

item.title: 日元因欧盟新关税截止日期而下跌，日本股市将随之波动
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示将把欧盟面临 50%关税的最后期限延长至 7 月 9 日，日元兑美元走软，日本股市可能出现波动。【原文：Japanese stocks may fluctuate after the yen weakened against the dollar as US President Donald Trump said he would extend the deadline for the European Union to face 50% tariffs until July 9.】

item.title: 特朗普推迟征收欧盟关税，避险需求减弱，黄金下滑
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普延长了全面关税措施的最后期限，有迹象表明他在与欧盟贸易问题上的激进立场可能会有所缓和，这影响了黄金的避风港地位。【原文：Gold slipped as its haven status was impacted by signs President Donald Trump may be easing his aggressive stance on trade with the European Union, after he extended a deadline on sweeping tariff measures.】

item.title: 特朗普延长对欧盟商品加征关税的最后期限，推动石油走高
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示将延长欧盟面临所谓对等关税的最后期限之后，石油连续第二个交易日上涨，这使人们对缓解贸易紧张局势感到乐观。【原文：Oil rose for a second session after President Donald Trump said he would extend the deadline for the European Union to face so-called reciprocal tariffs, raising some optimism for easing trade tensions.】

item.title: 泰国部长表示，东盟必须不断加入全球供应链
item.description: 泰国外长说，东南亚国家应研究如何进一步整合其区域和全球供应链，以获得规模经济效益并进入更大的市场。【原文：Southeast Asian nations should look at ways to further integrate their supply chains regionally and around the world to reap the benefits of economies of scale and gain access to larger markets, Thailand’s foreign minister said.】

item.title: WiseTech 同意以 21 亿美元债务融资收购 E2open
item.description: 澳大利亚航运软件公司 WiseTech Global Ltd. 已同意收购 E2open Parent Holdings Inc.【原文：Australian shipping software company WiseTech Global Ltd. has agreed to buy E2open Parent Holdings Inc. in a deal that values the US company at $2.1 billion.】

item.title: 脱欧期限延长，美国股市期货上涨：市场综述
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）延长了对欧洲征收激进关税的最后期限后，美国股指期货在周一亚洲早盘交易中攀升。【原文：US equity-index futures climbed in early Asian trading on Monday after President Donald Trump extended a deadline on aggressive European tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普支持新日铁协议带来巨大疑问
item.description: 经过 17 个多月的游说和艰苦谈判，日本新日本制铁公司（Nippon Steel Corp.【原文：After more than 17 months of lobbying and close-fought negotiations to secure control of United States Steel Corp., Japan’s Nippon Steel Corp. appeared on Friday to have received a presidential blessing.】

item.title: 特朗普将对欧盟商品征收 50%关税的最后期限延长至 7 月 9 日
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在与欧盟委员会主席乌尔苏拉-冯德莱恩通电话后表示，他将把欧盟面临 50%关税的最后期限延长至 7 月 9 日。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would extend the deadline for the European Union to face 50% tariffs until July 9 after a phone call with Commission President Ursula von der Leyen.】

item.title: 创纪录的印度私人信贷交易取决于棘手的抵押品
item.description: 从表面上看，印度创纪录的私人信贷交易是市场的一个里程碑。【原文：On the surface, India’s record-breaking private credit deal is a milestone for the market.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 从中国到欧洲的市场上，鸡肉将更难买到，因为头号出口国巴西发现了一例禽流感病例。北半球夏季即将来临，飓风预报和美国汽油需求预测也随之而来。被称为 "钴的沙特阿拉伯 "的刚果民主共和国正在成为中美贸易战中的一员。【原文：Chicken is going to be harder to come by in markets from China to Europe after a case of bird flu was detected in top exporter Brazil. Summer is just around the corner in the Northern Hemisphere, prompting forecasts for hurricanes as well as predictions about gasoline demand in the US. And the Democratic Republic of the Congo — dubbed the “Saudi Arabia of cobalt” — is becoming a player in the trade war between China and the US.】

item.title: 国债交易员进入删节周，通胀成为首要考虑因素
item.description: 疲惫不堪的债券投资者在进入假期缩短的一周时，面临着新的美国通胀数据，而此时，由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的关税计划，消费者已经预计到了更大的价格压力。【原文：Weary bond investors enter a holiday-shortened week facing fresh US inflation readings at a time when consumers are already anticipating steeper prices pressures given President Donald Trump’s tariff plans.】
